Used this...as soon as you start this it will install and run Winhost32.exe. Check it out in your running processes if you are foolish enough to install this even with this warning. Winhost32.exe will then connect to an IRC and download the real malicious software, totally messing up your system. I went through this but was able to catch it all in time.
